original_text: Only the livestock we took as spoil for ourselves, with the plunder of the cities that we captured.
korean_text: 다만 그 가축과 성읍에서 탈취한 것은 우리의 소유로 삼았으며

sentences.original_text: Only the livestock we took as spoil for ourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 자신들을 위해 전리품으로 가져간 가축만

sentences.original_text: with the plunder of the cities that we captured
